Initial commit: Alpaca Portfolio Dashboard

A complete React portfolio dashboard for Alpaca Trading API featuring:

- Trade History with FIFO-based realized P/L calculations
- Performance Analytics with win rate, daily/cumulative P/L charts

Tech stack: Vite, React 19, Tailwind CSS v4, Recharts, React Router
